amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase ARPA-E to its FY2018 enacted level and sought to reduce Fossil Energy R&D by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to increase ARPA-E to its FY18 enacted level and reduces Fossil Energy R&D by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 214 (Roll no. 245).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Beyer.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 214 (Roll no. 245).
